main.description: Backend guru and frontend prodigy, I am a full-stack developer, using Python/Flask and ReactJS to build web applications
main.bio: Hi there! During my work hours I am a full-stack developer, which means I can build a web application from the ground up. I have a lot of experience with Python, Flask, React, PostgresQL and MS Azure. In my spare time I am a D&D Dungeon Master and a bass guitar player. I am also a fan of chess and I am always up for a game.
main.contactmessage: I prefer LinkedIn for business communications and offers.

resume.skillmessage: I am working in IT industry for 7 years now, 5 of them working with Python and 2 with ReactJS as well. I have really good understanding of cloud services, and my speciality is Microsoft Azure. I have a lot of experience building durable Azure Functions and Web Apps. When it comes to databases, I've been working with PostgresQL for my entire commercial experience, but I am also familiar with NoSQL databases like MongoDB. As a backend developer, I have a good grasp on REST API creation and thousand of CRUDs were created by me. I am a fun of Docker, though I didn't have an opportunity to work with Kubernetes. As a DevOps of my teams, I am also responsible for pipelines, and I am capable of creting CI/CD pipelines on Azure DevOps.

education.description: In my university I got a variety of different programming skills, like algorithms and data structures, object-oriented programming and linear algebra.
